name: 认国旗 - 幼儿园学前教育大巴士游戏宝典2
name_original: 认国旗 - 幼儿园学前教育大巴士游戏宝典2
description:
This is a part of a series of Chinese studying tools aimed at learning the national flag, we have not specifically translated it into other languages, just wish you learn Chinese in the real Chinese environment , to learn any language , the most important is to look himself as a child,As we know, the child is
a genius while learning language.

If you wish your children to learn Chinese, this software is also an excellent choice,for it is used teach Chinese kids too, wish you and your family successful in learning Chinese.
